sentences.en: Dress was the one unfailing talisman and charm used for keeping all things in their places.
sentences.cn: 服饰是百试不爽的灵符和神咒,可以维持一切事物的现有秩序.

sentences.en: Everyone admired her patience and unfailing good humour.
sentences.cn: 人人都佩服她的耐心和永不衰减的好脾气。

sentences.en: Has his unfailing love vanished forever ? Has his promise failed for all time?
sentences.cn: 8难道他的慈爱永远穷尽,他的应许世世废弃 吗 ?

sentences.en: He continued to appear in the office with unfailing regularity thereafter.
sentences.cn: 从那以后他照常出现在办公室，风雨无阻。

sentences.en: I hereby declare utter, unfailing hatred of colleagues who write half - baked English.
sentences.cn: 谨此宣布﹔毫无保留地、底地憎恨把英文写得半生不熟的同事.

sentences.en: In your unfailing love, silence my enemies ; destroy all my foes, for I am your servant.
sentences.cn: 12凭你的慈爱剪除我的 仇敌 、 灭绝一切苦待我的人.因我是你的仆人.

sentences.en: Let your face shine on your servant ; save me in your unfailing love.
sentences.cn: 16求你使你的脸光照仆人,凭你的慈爱拯救我.

sentences.en: NIV But I trust in your unfailing love; my heart rejoices in your salvation.
sentences.cn: [和合]但我倚靠你的慈爱, 我的心因你的8救恩快乐.

sentences.en: NIV Rise up and help us; redeem us because of your unfailing love.
sentences.cn: [和合]求你起来帮助我们, 凭你的慈爱救39赎我们.

sentences.en: Rise up and help us; redeem us because of your unfailing love.
sentences.cn: 26求你起来帮助我们, 凭你的慈爱救赎我们.

sentences.en: She battled against cancer with unfailing good humour.
sentences.cn: 她始终乐观地与癌症抗争。

sentences.en: She fought the disease with unfailing good humour .
sentences.cn: 她始终抱乐观态度同疾病斗争。

sentences.en: The sadness which reigned everywhere was but an excuse for unfailing kindness.
sentences.cn: 遍地的苦痛随时为他提供行善的机会.

sentences.en: Their discipline and good behaviour was unfailing.
sentences.cn: 他们的纪律和良好行为始终如一.

sentences.en: What a man desires is unfailing love; better to be poor than a liar.
sentences.cn: 22施行仁慈的、令人爱慕. 穷人强如说谎言的.

sentences.en: Within your temple, O God, we meditate on your unfailing love.
sentences.cn: 9上帝啊, 我们在你的殿中想念你的慈爱.

words.tran_cn: 可靠地；无穷尽地；不倦地

trans.tran_cn: 永恒的，无穷的，可靠的，确实的
trans.tran_en: always there, even in times of difficulty or trouble
